messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: Liberal Democrats work hard all year round, not just at election time. We're in touch all year round, not just at election time.

messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: This leaflet gives you two good reasons to vote Liberal Democrat. It's the same wherever you live – across Britain, the Liberal Democrats can win and are winning today.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ann wants better public transport with local residents in mind.
Ann will fight for more Police on the beat and against the gun culture.
Ann will work to protect the NHS from Labour's cuts and privatisation.

mentions.candidate: Ann Holtom is fighting for you, she is the only candidate who lives in the constituency.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The note on the image might suggest some tactical voting recommendation but since it's not legible, no specific information is provided in this section.

issues.governance: Thousands of local residents are angry about Labour's betrayal.
issues.health: Ann will work to protect the NHS from Labour's cuts and privatisation.

housing.content: Raised funds for new lower paid affordable homes

leaflet.personalStatement: Ann Holtom is fighting for you. She lives in the constituency. Ann's first American patron saint was St Jude – the saint of lost causes. She believes the cause of the Lib Dems in Tyburn Ward is very far from lost.

politicalExperience.achievements: Ann has worked tirelessly for local residents.

images.caption: Ann Holtom pictured in Tyburn Ward
